name: Like a Bat Out of Hell
name_original: Like a Bat Out of Hell
description:
--Before You Buy--

  1. As there is only 1 level in the game at the moment, I recommend you to buy only for support.
  2. 2.If you want to try it before you buy, you can contact me on Twitter or Instagram to get a free copy that won't be updated.
  3. If you decide to buy after trying and you think the price is too much, you can contact me for a discount .
  4. Contact : Twitter - Instagram
  5. I'm new to game development and it can take 1-2 months for all the mechanics and levels I intend to add to the game to finish.
  6. I can add a few different languages if necessary in the future, according to requests.
  7. I'm sorry for my english, I can't explain myself very well.
